top_comments.comment: I'm way older than you are (56), and even I used that foundation in high school! I only have to look at it and I remember that awful smell! 🤢. I love that Cover Girl is one of the few mainstream brands that are cruelty free. I mostly buy from Indie brands, but if I have to buy something from the drugstore I try to buy from Cover Girl. So glad your Mom is recovering well ❤️🚙🇨🇦
Omg Covergirl Clean liquid foundation takes me BACK!

I recently purchased CG's Clean foundation and powder. I still love the way they smell, and I thought it felt light, and looked great on my skin with a moisturizing primer. Natural, but evened out with a bit of coverage.

I always wanted to see a blended layered blush look on you and you look phenomenal! Haha I’ve been a subscriber for years and I like when you apply blushes but this look in particular was so nice on you in my opinion.
That Cover Girl smell takes me back to middle school in the mid 90s!
